title: regression: overflow evaluating, Send/Sync?

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-beta
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to beta.

body:
root: fuzzy-pickles - 1 detected crates which regressed due to this; cc @shepmaster -- [resolved](https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/61472#issuecomment-503596465)
<details>


 * fuzzy-pickles-0.1.0: [start](https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.36-2/1.35.0/reg/fuzzy-pickles-0.1.0/log.txt) v. [end](https://crater-reports.s3.amazonaws.com/beta-1.36-2/beta-2019-05-30/reg/fuzzy-pickles-0.1.0/log.txt); cc @shepmaster


</details>
